talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Nothin' but the finest quality is placed
right there.

That doesn't include your filthy feet,
ya get me?
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Welcome, WELCOME.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>All the diamonds are sold out for now.<sp:5:1:0>
But we're open to buying them!
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All the diamonds are sold out for now.<sp:5:1:0>
But we're open to buying them!
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome, welcome, WELCOME to the
diamond shop!

Marbled rock roast is yesterday's news!
It's all about the diamonds now.

And the best place to get THOSE is right
here, at <clr:0000>YunoboCo's store<clr:ffff>!
Com_Talk_16: <sp:3:0:2:0c00>I can't buy the clothes you're wearin'.
Com_Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You don't have enough rupees.
Come back with more.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Your pouch is full. Come back after you've
freed up some space.
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I heard there's some old Goron at
YunoboCo's mineral market—just outside
the gate—sellin' flint. What a joke.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>Everyone knows marbled rock roast is
where it's at! Anything other than that
is junk.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome, welcome, WELCOME! You may
have heard, but marbled rock roast is
old news.
These days it's all about the diamonds!


And the only place you'll find 'em
at such a great price is right here,
at <clr:0000>YunoboCo's store<clr:ffff>!
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I recommend attaching a diamond to
your shield!
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If ya wanna be extra fancy, you can attach
a diamond to your weapon.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>I heard that YunoboCo's mineral market—
just outside of the gate—is still sellin'
flint. What a joke.
Everyone knows marbled rock roast is
where it's at! Anything other than that
is junk.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>Even if diamonds are priced at <clr:0000>half of
normal<clr:ffff>, the only rock worth anythin' is
<clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>. I can't sell ya junk.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Huh... As usual, you still can't tell what's
worth buyin'.
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Oh. Guess you can't tell what's worth
your rupees.
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's all about the diamonds these days!


And the only place you'll find 'em
at such a great price is right here,
at <clr:0000>YunoboCo's store<clr:ffff>!
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you've got good stuff again, lemme see
it, yeah?
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Yes, indeed, YunoboCo mines nothin'
but the finest diamonds! You won't
be disappointed.
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Wow, buying all our most precious
diamonds...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Thanks for being such a solid customer!
